summary: After a 13-year imprisonment in Hong Kong, a kickboxer challenges the current champion in order to restore his honor.
cast: Andy Lau|Takako Tokiwa|Inthira Charoenpura|Apichaya Thanatthanapong|Reila Aphrodite|Kowit Butrachart|Nizondh Chaisirikul|Man-Yee Chan|Wing-Chung Chan|Juthaimas Changthong|Stephen Fox|Patrick Anthony Gayle|Natthawara Hongsuwan|Chaleampan Junthong|Loi-Kwan Kam|Kwok-Man Keung|Sirinthorn Kittisrisawai|Shiu-Hang Kwok|Manunya Limsatain|Gunyarat Maunboon|Thapakorn Maungkrang|Bismillah Nana|Peemachai Pengphol|Suchao Pongwilai|Yuen-Leung Poon|Sagat Porntavee|Visapas Puemsuotavee|Aroon Ho Lam Pui|Nirut Saosudchart|Suwat Seechompoo|Natalie Stybert|Samart Tayakaroon|Suchai Tigitnalerd|Ekachai Waritchaaporn|Kowit Wattanakul|Philip Wilson
director: Director: Daniel Lee (as Lee Yan Kong)
title: Ah Foo
